title: Update But no Tayliah?
body:
Hi,

So The new 6.10 Patch is out!
Aaaaand Tayliah was released but not purchasable?
I can look at her Summoner Profile & all.
But I cannot buy or use her?

-RedPandaFox

replies.body:
For as long as i can remember, very very few champs have been released exactly on the dot of the patch, sometimes they come out a few hours later, sometimes a day or two.

But you can be guaranteed that RIOT hasn't 'forgotten' to make her purchasable.

be patient.
